Description: The house is a legal duplex with 4 bedrooms on the main level and 2 bedrooms (unit B) on the lower level each with their own entrance. Parking for the main level is on the street on North Lawrence in front of the home. Parking for the lower level is at the back of the house that has a driveway and carport. All tenants in the house share a washer and dryer. As noted in this posting, the landlords provide a landscaper to take care of the basic yard clean up.
